title: Invited Speakers
text:
Agata Smoktunowicz — University of Edinburgh (UK)
Ilaria Colazzo — University of Leeds (UK)
Anastasia Doiku — Heriot-Watt University (UK)
Eric Jespers — Vrije Universiteit Brussel (Belgium)

This line-up features prominent researchers in algebra, combinatorics, and mathematical physics, whose work intersects with the Yang–Baxter equation. Their contributions will highlight current developments and open problems in the field.
We also welcome PhD students and postdocs to share their research in the Gong Talk session.
To register registration.

title: Combinatorial Approaches to the Yang–Baxter Equation
text:
📅 When?: October 9th, 2025
📍 Where? School of Mathematics, University of Leeds, UK
🔗 What? A one-day conference brings together researchers working on the combinatorial aspects of the Yang–Baxter equation and related algebraic structures.

title: Registration
text:
Registration for the workshop is not open yet.
Details on how to register will be posted here soon. Stay tuned!
Please note: Unfortunately, we are not able to offer funding or travel support for participants.
